features: 【Military Smart Watch For Men】DESONG Features 1.52" HD(360*360)Big Screen smart watch for men is made of aluminum alloy+ABS and tempered glass,military-grade materials and fully enclosed design makes it the toughest and sturdiest watch.Successfully passed many Military Tests Including, extreme temperature,dust resistance, salt spray,fluid pollution,etc.Our smart watches for men ensures that you use them confidently in a variety of harsh conditions.

【Smart Watch with Call and Notification】The Military smart watch has built-in speaker and microphone.It supports bluetooth to make and receive calls,play music and control camera. Also you can receive SMS and APP messages (Twitter, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram...) you won't miss any important information.

【Health Monitoring】Compatible with both Android and iOS phones, DESONG smartwatch provides heart rate,blood oxygenation,blood pressure and sleep tracking to help you assess your situation more accurately and make reasonable lifestyle changes.It has more useful features to make your life easier,such as weather forecast, alarm clock, camera control,music control, timer, sedentary reminder,etc.

【110+ Mode Fitness Tracker 】This fitness watch can record your steps, calories, and distance in real-time. It supports 110+ sports modes, such as outdoor walking, running, climbing, basketball, Yoga, etc.The smartwatches accurately collect the data and synchronize to your phone app, giving you more detaile.

【More Interesting Functions 】DESONG Military smart watches for men compatible with Android 6.0/iOS 9.0 and above. The watch has multiple built-in functions, like weather forecast, music control, camera control, calendar, calculator, alarm clock, find phone,Long sitting reminder, drinking reminder etc.Our smart watches for men make your life more convenient and effective.

【DIY Watch Face & Large Capacity Battery】In the "DAFIT" app,Bluetooth smartwatch has over 100+ different watch faces to choose from, and support for custom interface mode, you can add pictures as you want to set as your watch face. DESONG Smartwatch has built-in 350mAh battery that lasts 5-7 days on 2 hour charge and up to 15 days standby time. Saves you the hassle of frequent charging.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Desong Military Smart Watch for Men 1.52" HD Screen Outdoor Rugged Tactical Smartwatch Color: Black/Silver Watch Craft:Metal+ABS Display: 1.53 HD Circle Full Touch,360 * 360 Resolution Chipset:8763EWE+ 3605HR Bluetooth: BT 5.2 Battery Capacity: 350mah Charging Method: Magnetic Charging Waterproof Rating: IP67 App: DaFit Compatible System: Android4.4+, IOS9.0+ Note: Please Read the user manual carefully before use. This smartwatch is Water-Resistant but don't take a shower with the watch on, water vapor may enter the watch and damage the battery.

Always Keep Your Health Online! V55E Smartwatch features over 100 sports modes, including running, walking, cycling, skipping, basketball, football, badminton, etc. The sport watch can be used to monitor critical data such as workout heart-rate, distance traveled, movement speed, and calories burned in real-time for most sports modes, to help you track and improve your athletic performance. Also, phone smartwatches can also be used as an assistant: music and photo camera control, weather display, sedentary reminder, water drinking reminder, alarm clock, stopwatch, mobile phone search, games, calculators, etc. It also supports AI voice to help you control your watch and mobile phone and help you live a convenient life.

Main Function: Call Rreminder push, SMS reminder push, Message Reminder push(like Twitter, Facebook, Skype, WhatsApp, etc.),Movement record (step count, mileage, etc.), track map, sleep monitoring, sedentary reminder, calorie calculation, stopwatch, low power reminder, hand up bright screen, fast charging, ultra-low power consumption, heart rate, blood pressure, vibration, movement mode, remote photography, music control, intelligent alarm Weather forecast, HD large screen, multi dial switch.
